title: In The Arms of Tennessee
description: Seventeen year old Natalie Davidson had it all. The connections, the money, the wealthy perfect family but none of that mattered. She was an outcast in her family and her town of Piperton, Tennessee.Then Came Tennessee Jacobs. The new mysterious guy in town. The guy every girl drools over, the walking sex on a stick. The guy who would open Natalie's eyes the very same day they meet. All things change when September comes around..Natalie's first day of school was going according to plan then she saw him. Him, Tennessee Jacobs in her fourth period class behind the teachers desk writing on the black board.As he turns around and sees Natalie sitting behind a desk in the back of the class, everything he thought went up in the air. The love of his life is his student. Will fate be on their side or does all hell break loose?This novel contains graphic sexual content and strong language. It is intended for mature readers.
author: Brit N. Lane
